result.title: Final WeCount platform and sensor kits
result.description: The final WeCount platform and sensor kits adapted from D31 codesigned with users continuously in two initial pilots Leuven and Madrid as well as the three followup case studies Cardiff Dublin and LjubljanaThis will include an API to sensor data for users outside the consortium
